mapper.insert: insert into advancement (title, writer, refUser, content) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{refUser}, #{content})

INSERT INTO advancementUpfiles (originalFileName, newFileName, thumbFileName, fileType, ext, size, base64Image, refAdvancementNo, status) VALUES (#{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{thumbFileName}, #{fileType}, #{ext}, #{size}, #{base64Image}, #{refAdvancementNo}, 'NEW')
mapper.select: SELECT upfileNo, originalFileName, newFileName, thumbFileName, fileType, ext, size, base64Image, refAdvancementNo, status FROM advancementUpfiles WHERE refAdvancementNo = #{advancementNo}

SELECT advancementNo, title, writer, refUser, postDate, status, confirmDate, rejectMessage FROM advancement
title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
rejectMessage LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND status IN ('PASS', 'FAILURE')
AND status IN ('WAITING', 'CHECKED')
AND status = #{status}
AND postDate >= #{searchStartDate}
AND postDate <= #{searchEndDate}
ORDER BY
confirmDate
postDate
ASC
DESC
, advancementNo
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{rowCntPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT a.advancementNo, a.title, a.writer, a.refUser, a.postDate, a.content, a.status, a.confirmDate, a.rejectMessage, u.upfileNo, u.originalFileName, u.newFileName, u.thumbFileName, u.fileType, u.ext, u.size, u.base64Image, u.refAdvancementNo FROM advancement a LEFT JOIN advancementUpfiles u ON a.advancementNo = u.refAdvancementNo WHERE a.advancementNo = #{advancementNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE advancement
status = 'CHECKED'
WHERE advancementNo = #{advancementNo} AND status = 'WAITING'

UPDATE advancement
status = 'PASS' , confirmDate = NOW() , rejectMessage = null
WHERE refUser = #{refUser} LIMIT 20
